name: Tinkertown x Among Us
summary: After killing an entire crew and taking over their ship, an impostor mistakes a bright light in the world of Tinkertown for his secret haven, crash-landing on the planet. This opens up a brand new quest in Tinkertown where players can explore the crashed ship, solve puzzles blocking their way and escape with loot without getting caught by the impostor roaming the ship. Find a bunch of cool Among Us themed costumes, hats and decorative items and objects that can be used to decorate your houses back in your village.
